title: Wilton Sprinkles
generatedText: Wilton Sprinkles: This product is an excellent fit if you like to buy products that are free of preservatives, vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free. One serving of this product provides 15 calories, 0g grams of fat, 0g grams of protein, and 4g grams of carbs. We recommend choosing products with short ingredient lists, as these tend to be less processed. This product has 17 ingredients. This product contains no ingredients that some research suggests you should avoid.

ingredients.name: food color
ingredients.description: Color additives are tricky - both colors that we might perceive as natural (e.g. fruit juice and turmeric) and artificial colors (e.g. Red 3) might turn up on a food label under "artifical color" or "color added." This makes it difficult to know how safe these colorings are, since you do not know exactly what you are consuming. The FDA is wise not to make a distinction, however, because the process of extracting natural colors is far from natural and these substances are not necessarily safer!

ingredientList: Dextrose, Corn Starch, Dextrin, Carnauba Wax, Artificial Color, Titanium Dioxide (Color), FD&C Red 40, FD&C Yellow 5, FD&C Blue 1
